thread.title: Mrs. Lee
thread.title_full: Sparkles Make It Special reviewed by Mrs. Lee

author: Mrs. Lee
title: Mrs. Lee
text: The brown 8 row rhinestone ribbon was a perfect for our wedding flower centerpieces. Many of our guest complimented us! Thank you for the quick shipment and describing and delivering exactly what your website offered. I highly recommend Sparkles Make it Special!
